channel.title: How to update the rootfs on WP76
channel.description:
Hello,
I want to update the rootfs after building a yocto image that contains personalized script at init.d and rcS.d. Does any one have an idea how to update bith the kernel with the rootfs. Knowing that I tried with the fastboot but this command doesn't work with the WP7607.

item.title: How to update the rootfs on WP76
item.dc:creator: alex1
item.description:
Hello,

Some say we should add our own layer and put our script in the layer in order to insert it in the image.

This could help
https://community.nxp.com/docs/DOC-331917
https://www.yoctoproject.org/docs/latest/dev-manual/dev-manual.html#creating-a-general-layer-using-the-bitbake-layers-script

Read full topic
item.source: How to update the rootfs on WP76

item.title: How to update the rootfs on WP76
item.dc:creator: virpadte
item.description:
I am trying to do the same thing for the mangOH red platform. Can someone help on how to add a custom script to run it on boot?

Read full topic
